name: Alpaca Moon
description:
AlpacaMoon.zip is the CFN Jam version.

AlpacaMoonv1.1.zip is the bug fixed version.  CFN judges, please disregard this version.

Life for an alpaca isn't easy.  Our titular hero decides to leave his pen one day to go on a journey!  Things aren't so easy outside of the fence.  Punji pits and spear traps are all over the place and foxes roam hoping to make a meal of our favorite alpaca!  Moving through levels of platforming madness, our alpaca braves the greatest dangers for adventure and love!  Avoid the many dangers of freedom, collect gems to beat your high score, gather food to restore your health, and platform your way through the alpaca's mountains.

  • All graphics are hand drawn
  • Custom character controller
  • Mario style 2D running, jumping, and gem collection
  • Music may not be originally for this game, but I did write it!
  • Level select
  • Challenging gameplay
  • Dynamic platform motion
  • The hero is an alpaca!
